error.unable_to_play_spotify: Unable to play spotify track. Make sure you have logged into your spotify account on your sonos system.
error.no_instance: Not connected to Sonos system. Please check if the speaker is online or restart Homey, then try again.
error.lost_connection: Lost connection to Sonos Speaker. Please check if the speaker is online or restart Homey, then try again.
error.device_not_found: Could not find Sonos speaker on network. Please check if the speaker is online.
